Articles.Content:
TL;DR at bottom!

I really would love if someone could give me a .ckan file to make KSP a challenge like RO. I have a basic list of mods that i'd like to see.


  • KER
    64k
    All SETI-BASIC mods in the .ckan file (Only keep the Daschund and LV-900 from VSR)
    AJE but with the Whiplash and Wheesley (just rename the engines the stock ones are based on and try to make stats same as current)
    FAR
    DRE
    RealFuels Stock Configs, RealFuels Stock Balance
    Procedural Parts
    Procedural Fairings
    Procedural Fairings for Everything
    Stockalike Station Parts Expansion
    RLA Stockalike
    All NF packs including extras except for electric engine thrust reducer
    RemoteTech (keep as-is)
    RealChute (remove custom chutes, make the stock ones work
    StockLS (Keep it playing like stock!)

I know that isn't a command. Just terrible humor. Wait, it is? Huh, never knew that! Also, if it is possible to make a .ckan file in CKAN just tell me and I can assemble it! Better, faster, stronger! for the low, low price of $6,000,000!

TL;DR: Make it real physics but still Kerbal, I want a stock feel to it.

Edited October 21, 2015 by legoclone09

Also, if it is possible to make a .ckan file in CKAN just tell me and I can assemble it!

The CKAN wiki has a page about that. https://github.com/KSP-CKAN/CKAN/wiki/Sharing-a-modlist-%28metapackages%29
Ok, thank you stibbons. I'll do that.
